div.h4: A report is knowledge object that exists in the form of a saved search or pivot. Reports can be run manually, or on a regular interval and can be configured to generate alerts. You can accelerate slow-completing reports so that they finish faster, using either report acceleration or data model acceleration. Reports that do not qualify for report acceleration can be accelerated through summary indexing.

tr.td: Retains the current used License amount (in Bytes) for each sourcetype and index.
Lists the indexes and sourcetypes from the previous day.
List of hosts from the previous day.
Retains detailed license information about indexes and sourcetypes on a daily basis.
Retains summary license usage by pool on a daily basis.
Retains disk storage information for Indexers on a daily basis.
